long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables Puzzilla to analyze historical records in the FamilySearch source linker page to find records that contain a possible new person that is not found in FamilyTree. Without the extension Puzzilla cannot examine the facts in the historical record. Puzzilla does not make any changes to the data in the FamilySearch database.
